dialogue.text: …and there! A special art piece to commemorate this important moment! Look, that’s us!!
I…
(Urgh... I think my head is spinning... I really need some of that tea-)
Ah, Smoky. Fancy running into you out in the backstreets today. I assume you came by to browse my shop, is that correct?
Ah- Indeed, Herbal. I noticed everything was closed in town today.
It's been like this for almost a month now… we've been told that there's a mass renovation in the works, but no word on when they’ll finish.
I miss my little shop dearly… but I am happy to have run into you today. I happen to have your usual tea order on hand.
Consider this a gift for your frequent patronage.
Heh, thank you. I greatly appreciate it.
Wait, is that Wild Berry tea?
Ooo, hey hey, ma'am! Do you have any more of that stuff? That’s my mama and papa's favorite, and I'm on a VERY important quest to fetch them some!
Aren't you the sweetest little dewdrop, ahaha~
Alas, that was all I had on hand. My apologies, dear.
No more...? And all the shops are still closed, too…
Shoot… in a shocking twist, Gummy had ffffphhh... weeeghhh... f-failed her quest… Mama and Papa are gonna be s-so sad...
What grave consequences await our hero..? Find out next t-time on-
Here, kid. How about we make a trade?
-wehh..?
You let me keep this drawing, and… you take this tea to your parents.
Tell them your 'quest' was a success. Is that fair?
Wrgghhghgh... gwrrrghghh...  *sniffle sniffle*
WAAAHHHHGHHHH! Thank you so much!!! *triple sniffle*
And keep at it with your art, kid. I know you'll make your parents very proud.
This is the best episode ever… Thank you, thanky you!
And so, the day was saved from the generous offerings of the ashen cloud. Our sobby-eyed star, Gummy, sets off on her journey back home.
What adventures await our hero next? Find out on the next exciting episode of… Gummy's Grand Tales! Cut to credits!
